name: Tactical Chicken (KSavage11)
description:
Tactical Chicken is an intense action game about defeating enemies before they defeat you. 

The game contains multiple upgrades that make the game much more enjoyable and exiting as the levels increase in difficulty. 

The game contains has a fun gameplay loop as well as multiple features and different gameplay modes.

Code: "Release!" for 25000 gold! Code: "NolanIsBad" for 15000 gold!
